segments.text: Whoa, I didn't expect to see the sink overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's just running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman's completely zoned out on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the water; that's unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy on the stoolâ€”didn't see that coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies while it's tipping!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's joining in, hand outstretched surprisingly bold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets open wide, jar full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing faster than I thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is so calm; contrasts the surprise inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, yet chaos brews.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup caught me off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel bunched up oddly on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR
